divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were heading home in our car around 8 at night & we noticed 4 bright objects in the sky & not moving. Then 2 disappeared. Then the two that were left seemed to hover & then one of the objects pulsated quickly as it dropped closer to the other object. I have never seen anything like this before. No of the objects made noise. The two objects seemed to be communicating with one another by pulsating. Then the one object started to rise. That is when I stopped filming because we had to move out of the way for another car.
Summary: 4 glowing objects that hovered with no sound. Then went down to two with one of them pulsating rapidly & descending . Then the two seemed to be communicating with each other by pulsating.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Chalfont
There were no other sightings in Chalfont on or around February 18th 2013
